project.name: MapComplete Open Bookcase Map
project.description: A public bookcase is a small streetside cabinet, box, old phone boot or some other objects where books are stored

tags.description: The MapComplete theme Open Bookcase Map has a layer Bookcases showing features with this tag

The layer 'Bookcases allows to upload images and adds them under the 'image'-tag (and image:0, image:1, ... for multiple images). Furhtermore, this layer shows images based on the keys image, wikidata, wikipedia, wikimedia_commons and mapillary

The layer 'Bookcases allows to upload images and adds them under the 'image'-tag (and image:0, image:1, ... for multiple images). Furhtermore, this layer shows images based on the keys image, wikidata, wikipedia, wikimedia_commons and mapillary

The layer 'Bookcases allows to upload images and adds them under the 'image'-tag (and image:0, image:1, ... for multiple images). Furhtermore, this layer shows images based on the keys image, wikidata, wikipedia, wikimedia_commons and mapillary

The layer 'Bookcases allows to upload images and adds them under the 'image'-tag (and image:0, image:1, ... for multiple images). Furhtermore, this layer shows images based on the keys image, wikidata, wikipedia, wikimedia_commons and mapillary
Layer 'Bookcases' shows and asks freeform values for key 'name' (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Open Bookcase Map')

Layer 'Bookcases' shows noname=yes&name= with a fixed text, namely 'This bookcase doesn't have a name' and allows to pick this as a default answer (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Open Bookcase Map')

Layer 'Bookcases' shows noname=yes&name= with a fixed text, namely 'This bookcase doesn't have a name' and allows to pick this as a default answer (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Open Bookcase Map') Picking this answer will delete the key name.
Layer 'Bookcases' shows and asks freeform values for key 'capacity' (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Open Bookcase Map')
Layer 'Bookcases' shows books=children with a fixed text, namely 'Mostly children books' and allows to pick this as a default answer (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Open Bookcase Map')
Layer 'Bookcases' shows books=adults with a fixed text, namely 'Mostly books for adults' and allows to pick this as a default answer (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Open Bookcase Map')

Layer 'Bookcases' shows books=children;adults with a fixed text, namely 'Both books for kids and adults' and allows to pick this as a default answer (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Open Bookcase Map')
Layer 'Bookcases' shows indoor=yes with a fixed text, namely 'This bookcase is located indoors' and allows to pick this as a default answer (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Open Bookcase Map')
Layer 'Bookcases' shows indoor=no with a fixed text, namely 'This bookcase is located outdoors' and allows to pick this as a default answer (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Open Bookcase Map')
Layer 'Bookcases' shows indoor= with a fixed text, namely 'This bookcase is located outdoors' (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Open Bookcase Map') Picking this answer will delete the key indoor.
Layer 'Bookcases' shows access=yes with a fixed text, namely 'Publicly accessible' and allows to pick this as a default answer (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Open Bookcase Map')
Layer 'Bookcases' shows access=customers with a fixed text, namely 'Only accessible to customers' and allows to pick this as a default answer (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Open Bookcase Map')
Layer 'Bookcases' shows and asks freeform values for key 'operator' (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Open Bookcase Map')
Layer 'Bookcases' shows and asks freeform values for key 'brand' (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Open Bookcase Map')

Layer 'Bookcases' shows brand=Little Free Library&nobrand= with a fixed text, namely 'Part of the network 'Little Free Library'' and allows to pick this as a default answer (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Open Bookcase Map')

Layer 'Bookcases' shows brand=Little Free Library&nobrand= with a fixed text, namely 'Part of the network 'Little Free Library'' and allows to pick this as a default answer (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Open Bookcase Map') Picking this answer will delete the key nobrand.

Layer 'Bookcases' shows nobrand=yes&brand= with a fixed text, namely 'This public bookcase is not part of a bigger network' and allows to pick this as a default answer (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Open Bookcase Map')

Layer 'Bookcases' shows nobrand=yes&brand= with a fixed text, namely 'This public bookcase is not part of a bigger network' and allows to pick this as a default answer (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Open Bookcase Map') Picking this answer will delete the key brand.
Layer 'Bookcases' shows and asks freeform values for key 'ref' (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Open Bookcase Map')

Layer 'Bookcases' shows nobrand=yes&brand=&ref= with a fixed text, namely 'This bookcase is not part of a bigger network' and allows to pick this as a default answer (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Open Bookcase Map')

Layer 'Bookcases' shows nobrand=yes&brand=&ref= with a fixed text, namely 'This bookcase is not part of a bigger network' and allows to pick this as a default answer (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Open Bookcase Map') Picking this answer will delete the key brand.

Layer 'Bookcases' shows nobrand=yes&brand=&ref= with a fixed text, namely 'This bookcase is not part of a bigger network' and allows to pick this as a default answer (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Open Bookcase Map') Picking this answer will delete the key ref.
Layer 'Bookcases' shows and asks freeform values for key 'start_date' (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Open Bookcase Map')
Layer 'Bookcases' shows and asks freeform values for key 'website' (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Open Bookcase Map')
